subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mets first baseman Carlos Delgado believes that his forgettable statistics in 2007 were a result of his stubbornness and a mechanical flaw, not the start of a decline or slow hands.
snippet: Mets first baseman Carlos Delgado believes that his forgettable statistics in 2007 were a result of his stubbornness and a mechanical flaw, not the start of a decline or slow hands.
